description.displayText:
Winsome was a dependable, trustworthy, and gentle caregiver for my father while I was away on a business trip. It was an unusual job, but Winsome was able to accommodate us: We needed daily help administering medication into my father's eye, but only during the middle of the day when my wife was not around, and only for one week. 

Despite the awkward time restrictions we had, Winsome was able to fit us into her schedule and was on-time, highly communicative, kind, and gentle. We were very lucky to find her.
description.originalText:
Winsome was a dependable, trustworthy, and gentle caregiver for my father while I was away on a business trip. Despite the awkward time restrictions we had, Winsome was able to fit us into her schedule and was on-time, highly communicative, kind, and gentle. We were very lucky to find her.

description.displayText: It is with the highest love and gratitude that I HIGHLY recommend Winsome for her services.  I hired Winsome on 9/29/22 to take care of my mother in at home hospice care 24 hours around the clock.  From the first call we had together, I could see her kindness towards caring for others.  She met with me first in my mother's home to see how it was set up and then went to the hospital to meet my Mom so she saw what care she needed.  The care and love I saw her give to my Mom from day one was astounding!!  She treated her as if my Mom was her mother and never missed a day since she started working with her.    Mom passed away on 10/31/22 but Winsome, her daughter Keisha and I have become lifelong sisters.  They are exceptional caregivers with blessed hands. There is simply no one else I could have gotten better care from.  Hire her and know your loved one is in good hands.

description.displayText: Winsome has been everything I was hoping for when looking for someone to help out part-time with my mom.  She's, first of all, a warm and loving person, caring and compassionate and eager to help wherever and whenever needed.  Equally important is that she has been completely reliable, has never been even a moment late.  My mom is a stubborn one, who was refusing any help, so the fact that she's grown so fond of Winsome speaks volumes.  I highly recommend Winsome - except for when my mom needs her.

description.displayText: Winsome is a lovely person.  She cares deeply about the people she work with.  Always on time and ready to work.  Winsome is very compassionate and passionate.  Excellent choice for a care giver.  Your mama or father will enjoy her upbeat personality. I know i do.    I recommend her highly. I give her 5 stars.
